articles.description: Red Bull's Max Verstappen accused of acting like Wacky Races villain Dick Dastardly by former world champion Damon Hill.
articles.title: Max Verstappen: Dutchman accused of Dick Dastardly tactics by Damon Hill

articles.description: Interim manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says Manchester United can "climb back to the levels that I knew here as a player".
articles.title: Man Utd: Interim manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says club can be 'unstoppable'

articles.description: England prop Joe Marler deactivates his X account after posting that the haka "needs binning" before Saturday's match against New Zealand.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Joe Marler deletes X post saying haka 'needs binning'

articles.description: BBC Sport analyses the positives and negatives on whether England captain Jos Buttler should give up the wicketkeeping gloves in white-ball cricket.
articles.title: West Indies vs England: Should Jos Buttler give up the wicketkeeping gloves in white-ball cricket?

articles.description: Cam Roigard suffered a knee injury that threatened to derail his Test career before it had properly started. But he is back - quicker and stronger than ever.
articles.title: England v New Zealand: Cam Roigard's return after knee injury

articles.description: Valencia’s Copa del Rey match away to Spanish sixth-tier side Parla Escuela is postponed until 6 November after devastating flash floods in Spain.
articles.title: Valencia match postponed after at least 62 people die in Spain flash floods

articles.description: Two-weight undisputed champion Katie Taylor says retirement is "not really on my radar at all" as she prepares for her much-anticipated rematch with Amanda Serrano.
articles.title: Katie Taylor: Retirement not on lightweight champion's radar before Amanda Serrano rematch

articles.description: BBC Sport speaks to those who witnessed the epic heavyweight title fight between Muhammad Ali and George Foreman in Zaire.
articles.title: The Rumble in the Jungle 50 years on, by those who witnessed it

articles.description: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou said he "always" wins a trophy in his second season. Before the EFL Cup tie against Manchester City, BBC Sport takes a look at his chances.
articles.title: Tottenham v Manchester City: Will Ange Postecoglou guide Spurs to second-season success?

articles.description: Former Man Utd player Diego Forlan will make his professional tennis debut at the age of 45. This is how he has gone from football to the ATP Tour.
articles.title: Diego Forlan on tennis: From beating Ruud van Nistlerooy at Man Utd to becoming ATP Tour professional
